post.text: "All the progress we've made is at stake in this election. My name may not be on the ballot, but our progress is on the ballot. Tolerance is on the ballot. Democracy is on the ballot. Justice is on the ballot." â€”President Obama: IWillVote.com

comment.author: Devin
comment.text: I hope we can get rid of Obama for good! Worse pres. In U. S. History!!!!!!!!!
